Landing.HeroHeader: Make your money flow securely visible
Landing.HeroText: Make informed decisions about your financial situation without handing over your data.
Landing.HeroImageAlt: An illustration for representing mfloww's features
Landing.InfluenceDesc1: Every data is encrypted with your unique key and stored on your device.
Landing.InfluenceDesc2: Add your income/expense in any currency you want from a large currency pool.
Landing.InfluenceHeader3: Visualize your money flow like never before
Landing.InfluenceDesc3: Detailly inspect your money flow on a very talented graph.
Landing.InfluenceDesc4: Prioritize the security and privacy of your financial data. Transparent development process enables independent security audits.

FAQ.Title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.FAQText1: mfloww is an open source money flow visualization application that encrypts data and stores it on the user's device. Encrypted data can only be processed with the user's unique key.
FAQ.FAQText2: mfloww was created for any person or organization that prioritizes privacy for their financial data and freedom. But it also provides value to those who only care about money flow visualizations.
FAQ.FAQText3: mfloww provides a powerful tool to gain control over your finances, make informed decisions, and work towards your financial goals. mfloww addresses a fundamental need for individuals/organizations to have a clear understanding of their financial situation.
FAQ.FAQTitle4: Can I import transactions from my bank accounts?
FAQ.FAQText4: For now, you can only manually import your transactions.
FAQ.FAQTitle5: How do I contact if I have an issue, question or feature request?
FAQ.FAQText5: You can create an issue. Or you can send an email to contact@mfloww.com.
FAQ.FAQTitle6: Can I sync the app across multiple devices?
FAQ.FAQText6: Within the application you can send a specific device’ encrypted data to other devices. Stored encrypted data for sync across devices will be erased from server within 2 hours.
FAQ.FAQTitle7: What is the the tech stack?
FAQ.FAQText7: Prisma, NestJS, Angular and TypeScript.

Settings.ProfileDesc: Your email address is your identity on mfloww. If you change your email address or username, your session will also expire.
Settings.PasswordDesc: If you change your password, your session will also expire.
Settings.ChangeBaseCurrencyDesc: Calculations are converted to the selected currency.
Settings.DeleteLocalDBDesc: Data on this device will be deleted. Warning deletion is irreversible.
Settings.DeleteAccountDesc: Your account and data on this device will be deleted. Warning deletion is irreversible.
